snippet: The university’s Police Department said that the shooting was not random and that the downtown campus, which serves about 12,000 students, was not under threat.
abstract: Rutgers University student Shani Patel is shot and killed, and his roommate wounded, during attack in their apartment near school's Newark campus; no suspects have been identified but Rutgers police say shooting was not random.
lead_paragraph: The university’s Police Department said that the shooting was not random and that the downtown campus, which serves about 12,000 students, was not under threat.

headline.main: Rutgers Student Killed in Shooting Near Newark Campus
headline.print_headline: Student, 21, at Rutgers Is Fatally Shot in Apartment

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
